org.xflatdb.xflat.query

Class InvalidQueryException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.xflatdb.xflat.query.InvalidQueryException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidQueryException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    This exception is thrown when a query is invalid based on one or more of the indexes on a table.

    Indexes generally ensure that the selected value is of a certain type. If a query then expects the value to be a different type, then this exception is generated.

    See Also:
